title: (x) White Club - Shelley Script Allegro {Florian}
content:
Hi, Im looking for this font (the part where it says "club") , if someone knows it please help me.

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016052651im_/http:/typophile.com/files/clubwhite_4729.JPG)
author: nolete

comments.content:
Hi Manolo,

that’s [Shelley Script Allegro](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016052651/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/shelley_script_allegro/?&sample_text=Club&sample_size=144) by [Matthew Carter](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016052651/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Matthew%20Carter).  
F
